Reviews.Title: “Nice for a low budget city trip”

Reviews.Content: stayed friend 4 nights hotel arrival sabiha taxi taksim fixed price 20 tl bit expensive receptionists friendly helpful knowledge english sufficient arrived morning wait 20 minutes offered free breakfast meantime negative doorman met luggage able ourselves tip business didnt happy amount stayed cold unfriendly rest stay 3rd floor disco bus station inclusive noisy night left window ear plugs job bathroom clean cleaned day totally okay price payed surroundings hotel shabby looks bit dangerous girls didnt care tram famous tourist attractions reached walk 30 minutes breakfast fancy suitable sausages cheese sweet cookies cereals eggs pudding olives tomatoes soup coffee kinds juices missed water juices werent delicious recommend hotel dont mind shabby surroundings hotel istanbul trip
